alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 1:50PM MST until January 19 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central, and southeast Montana. Portions of north central Wyoming. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Wednesday. Snow will become much lighter by Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on areas of poor visibility along with slick and snow-covered roads. Localized blowing snow is also expected. Please allow extra time for your evening and Wednesday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will fall below zero tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
